topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Launching a Virtual Machine Console

body.p: You can launch a console session to a virtual machine directly through the Horizon interface.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.

Based on whether you are working on a project or the domain:
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances tab.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Instances tab.

In the Instances table, for the instance you want to pause, click Edit Instance then Console.
To exit the full-screen mode, click the browser's back button. Note that you might return to the Project dashboard after the console window closes.
